thread.title: Cold wave conditions forecast for parts of Telangana
thread.title_full: Cold wave conditions forecast for parts of Telangana

author: Uniindia News Service
title: Cold wave conditions forecast for parts of Telangana
text: States Â» SouthPosted at: Nov 20 2025 2:52AM Cold wave conditions forecast for parts of TelanganaHyderabad, Nov 19 (UNI) Cold wave conditions are likely to prevail in isolated pockets of Adilabad, Komaram Bheem Asifabad, Nirmal, Nizamabad, Sangareddy, Medak and Kamareddy districts, the Meteorological Centre said on Wednesday. In its daily weather report, the Met office said minimum temperatures are expected to remain 3 to 4 degrees Celsius below normal at isolated locations across Telangana for the next two days. Light to moderate rain or thundershowers may occur at a few isolated places in the state between November 22 and 25. Dry weather is expected to continue for the next three days. During the past 24 hours, severe cold wave conditions were reported in isolated pockets of Medak district, while cold wave conditions prevailed in parts of Adilabad. Medak recorded the lowest minimum temperature of 9.6 degrees Celsius, the report added. UNI VV RNTags: #Cold wave conditions forecast for parts of Telangana
